entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING, Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:19 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -1.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C

Visibility: 0.6 km

Dewpoint: -2.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
